hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#/bin/sh #run script make iso branded #cd ${WORKSPACE}/EMS/VersionRelease #. branding_iso.sh
#sh brandedscript.sh DVD3_EMS_${TAG} ${COMPANY}
#/bin/sh
version=${TAG} dvd3_iso=DVD3_EMS_$version.iso major=${BRANCH} company=${COMPANY} cd /home/centos curl -k -u ems-build:emspass -X GET https://artifactory/ems-release/com/ac/ems/ovoc_server/"$major"/official_iso/"$dvd3_iso"?archiveType=iso >"$dvd3_iso" curl -k -u ems-build:emspass -X GET https://artifactory/ems-externals/com/ac/ems/branding/"$company"/about_logo.png>about_logo.png
curl -k -u ems-build:emspass -X GET https://artifactory/ems-externals/com/ac/ems/branding/"$company"/logo_login.png>logo_login.png
curl -k -u ems-build:emspass -X GET https://artifactory/ems-externals/com/ac/ems/branding/"$company"/logo.png>logo.png
curl -k -u ems-build:emspass -X GET https://artifactory/ems-externals/com/ac/ems/branding/"$company"/ovoc_logo.svg>ovoc_logo.svg curl -k -u ems-build:emspass -X GET https://artifactory/ems-externals/com/ac/ems/branding/"$company"/ovoc_logo_white.svg>ovoc_logo_white.svg curl -k -u ems-build:emspass -X GET https://artifactory/ems-externals/com/ac/ems/branding/"$company"/globalLogo.png>globalLogo.png
chmod 755 about_logo.png chmod 755 logo_login.png chmod 755 logo.png chmod 755 ovoc_logo.svg chmod 755 ovoc_logo_white.svg chmod 755 globalLogo.png
rm -rf /home/centos/original_iso
mkdir /home/centos/original_iso
sudo mount -o rw,loop -t iso9660 "$dvd3_iso" /home/centos/original_iso cp -avr /home/centos/original_iso/ /home/centos/copy_original_iso/
#for braches 7.4* and 7.6* copy these files if [[ "$BRANCH" =~ "7.4" || "$BRANCH" =~ "7.6" ]] then cp -f /home/centos/logo.png /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/web-ui-ovoc/assets/images/logo.png cp -f /home/centos/about_logo.png /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/web-ui-ovoc/assets/images/about_logo.png cp -f /home/centos/logo_login.png /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/web-ui-ovoc/assets/images/logo_login.png cp -f /home/centos/about_logo.png /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/web-ui-ovoc/images/about_logo.png elif [[ "$BRANCH" =~ "7.8" || "$BRANCH" =~ "7.8.1000" ]] then #for branches 7.8 and 7.8.1000 copy these files cp -f /home/centos/ovoc_logo_white.svg /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/web-ui-ovoc/assets/svgs/ovoc_logo_white.svg cp -f /home/centos/ovoc_logo.svg /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/web-ui-ovoc/assets/svgs/ovoc_logo.svg cp -f /home/centos/globalLogo.png /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/externals/security/logo/globalLogo.png rm -rf /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/web-ui-ovoc/assets/svgs/audiocodes_logo.svg rm -rf /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/web-ui-ovoc/assets/images/ac_background.svg zip -d /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/jars/javax.servlet-3.0.0.v201112011016.jar 'META-INF/*.SF' 'META-INF/*.RSA' else #for branches 7.8.2000 and up copy these files cp -f /home/centos/ovoc_logo_white.svg /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/web-ui-ovoc/infra2/components/acIcons/ac-svg/svgs/ovoc_logo_white.svg cp -f /home/centos/ovoc_logo.svg /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/web-ui-ovoc/infra2/components/acIcons/ac-svg/svgs/ovoc_logo.svg cp -f /home/centos/globalLogo.png /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/externals/security/logo/globalLogo.png rm -rf /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/web-ui-ovoc/infra2/components/acIcons/ac-svg/svgs/audiocodes_logo.svg rm -rf /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/web-ui-ovoc/infra2/assets/images/ac_background.svg zip -d /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/jars/javax.servlet-3.0.0.v201112011016.jar 'META-INF/*.SF' 'META-INF/*.RSA' fi
mkdir -p /home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/emsFiles/conf echo ${COMPANY} >/home/centos/copy_original_iso/EmsServerInstall/ac_ems_deploy/server_"$version"/emsFiles/conf/branding.txt
if [ $COMPANY == Nuera ]; then mkdir Documentation curl -k -u ems-build:emspass -X GET https://artifactory/ems-externals/com/ac/ems/branding/"$company"/Docs/'299-090-550 One Voice Operations Center Release Notes Ver. 7.6.pdf'?archiveType=pdf>Documentation/'299-090-550 One Voice Operations Center Release Notes Ver. 7.6.pdf' curl -k -u ems-build:emspass -X GET https://artifactory/ems-externals/com/ac/ems/branding/"$company"/Docs/'299-091-046 One Voice Operations Center User Manual Ver. 7.6.pdf'?archiveType=pdf>Documentation/'299-091-046 One Voice Operations Center User Manual Ver. 7.6.pdf' curl -k -u ems-build:emspass -X GET https://artifactory/ems-externals/com/ac/ems/branding/"$company"/Docs/'299-094-168 One Voice Operations Center IOM Manual Ver. 7.6.pdf'?archiveType=pdf>Documentation/'299-094-168 One Voice Operations Center IOM Manual Ver. 7.6.pdf' chmod -R 755 Documentation rm -rf /home/centos/copy_original_iso/Documentation cp -rf Documentation/ /home/centos/copy_original_iso/ fi
rm -rf DVD3_EMS_"$version".iso mkisofs -V DVD3_EMS -o DVD3_EMS_"$version".iso -R -J -joliet-long copy_original_iso
